doc.after: The Faculty of Arts and Sciences has primary responsibility for instruction in Harvard College Graduate School of Arts and Sciences and the Harvard Division of Continuing Education which includes Harvard Summer School and Harvard Extension School There is also the Radcliffe Institute for Advanced Study
